Occupation History:
Chloé Bernard is a 40 year old CEO from France.
Chloé Bernard launched her career as a Research Scientist at Cellectis S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2008 to 2010.
Her subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at Ipsen S.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 2011 to 2015.
From 2015 till now, she served as a CEO at Cellectis S.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 150000 EUR.
She owns house in Saint-Étienne, where she resides. It is worth 1670000 EUR.
